physical_appearance: This is a short-sleeved denim jacket. It has a circular collar and frog buttons. It is lined with a brown striped fabric.
sgcool_label_text: This short-sleeve jacket has a circular collar and frog buttons with a placket underneath. It is lined with a brown striped fabric.It is usually paired with a pair of black pants. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
